verify.format: select account From sys_user Where account='%s'
verify.title: 用户

verify.format: select name From role Where name='%s'
verify.title: 角色名称

verify.format: select code From audit_item Where count='%s'
verify.title: 控制项编码

verify.format: select value from auto_content where type=3 AND value=%s
verify.title: 类型值

verify.format: select value from auto_content where type=0 AND value=%s
verify.title: 类型值

verify.format: select value from auto_content where type=1 AND value=%s
verify.title: 类型值

verify.format: select value from auto_content where type=2 AND value=%s
verify.title: 类型值

verify.format: select value from auto_content where type=5 AND value=%s
verify.title: 类型值

verify.format: select value from auto_content where type=4 AND value=%s
